burn-engine.title: Burn Engine
burn-engine.overview: The core protocol that powers the entire ASDF ecosystem. Burn Engine implements the Optimistic Burn mechanism, automatically burning tokens on every transaction to create sustainable deflation.

features.name: Automatic burn on every transaction
features.what: Every time someone transfers, swaps, or interacts with ASDF tokens, a small percentage is automatically sent to a burn address, permanently removing it from circulation.
features.how: The smart contract hooks into the SPL Token transfer instruction using a Program Derived Address (PDA). Before completing any transfer, it calculates the burn amount and executes a CPI (Cross-Program Invocation) to the burn instruction.
features.why: This creates sustainable deflation without requiring user action. Unlike manual burns, this ensures consistent supply reduction with every transaction, increasing scarcity over time.

features.name: Configurable burn percentage
features.what: The burn rate can be adjusted by governance, allowing the community to fine-tune deflation based on market conditions.
features.how: The burn percentage is stored on-chain in a configuration account. Admin functions protected by multi-sig can update this value.
features.why: Flexibility is crucial for long-term sustainability. High burn rates work in bull markets but may be reduced during low activity periods.

features.name: Real-time burn tracking
features.what: Every burn event is logged and indexed, providing transparent, verifiable data on total supply reduction.
features.how: The contract emits events after each burn. Helius webhooks capture these events and push them to the Burn Tracker service.
features.why: Transparency builds trust. Users can verify that burns are happening as promised.

features.name: On-chain transparency
features.what: All burn operations are recorded directly on the Solana blockchain, creating an immutable audit trail.
features.how: Each burn creates a transaction with the burn instruction. The transaction signature, amount, and timestamp are permanently stored on-chain.
features.why: Blockchain transparency eliminates the need for trust. Anyone can independently verify burns.

burn-engine.dependencies: Helius RPC for reliable transaction processing. Jupiter for swap integrations.
burn-engine.architecture: The Burn Engine uses a Program Derived Address (PDA) to manage burn operations. Each transaction triggers a CPI call to the SPL Token burn instruction.

miniTree.name: Core Burn Logic
miniTree.what: The fundamental algorithm that calculates and executes token burns.
miniTree.how: Rust smart contract intercepts SPL Token transfers via CPI hooks.
miniTree.why: Automatic, trustless deflation without user action.
miniTree.future: Dynamic burn rates based on market conditions.

miniTree.name: Transaction Parser
miniTree.what: Analyzes incoming transactions to identify burn-eligible operations.
miniTree.how: Parses Solana instruction data to identify token transfers.
miniTree.why: Accurate parsing ensures correct burn amounts.

miniTree.name: Helius Integration
miniTree.how: Uses Helius Enhanced API for transaction simulation. Webhooks notify backend of burn events.

miniTree.name: Analytics Module
miniTree.how: Time-series database stores every burn event.

miniTree.name: Security Audit
miniTree.future: Continuous audit program. Bug bounty expansion.

miniTree.name: Cross-chain Bridge
miniTree.what: Enable burn mechanism across multiple blockchains.

roadmap.text: Implement configurable burn rates per token

burn-tracker.title: Burn Tracker
burn-tracker.overview: Real-time dashboard monitoring all burn transactions across the ecosystem. Aggregates data from on-chain events, calculates deflation metrics, and projects future supply.

features.name: Live burn feed with transaction details
features.what: A real-time stream showing every burn as it happens.
features.how: WebSocket connection receives push notifications from Helius webhooks.
features.why: Immediate visibility creates engagement and trust.

features.name: Historical charts and analytics
features.what: Interactive charts showing burn trends over time.
features.how: PostgreSQL stores all historical burn data. Chart.js renders visualizations.

features.name: Supply projection calculator
features.what: A tool that projects future token supply based on burn rates.
features.how: Takes historical burn rate averages, applies assumptions, calculates supply reduction curves.

features.name: Discord/Telegram alerts
features.what: Automated notifications when significant burns occur.
features.how: Threshold-based alert system triggers webhooks to Discord and Telegram.
features.why: Keeps the community informed and engaged.

burn-tracker.dependencies: Relies on Burn Engine events. Uses Helius webhooks.
burn-tracker.architecture: Backend subscribes to Helius webhooks. PostgreSQL stores historical data. WebSocket server pushes updates to clients.

miniTree.name: Webhook Listener
miniTree.how: Node.js server listens on secure endpoint.

miniTree.name: Data Pipeline
miniTree.what: Transforms raw blockchain data into queryable records.
miniTree.how: Message queue handles incoming events. Worker processes extract and insert into PostgreSQL.

miniTree.name: Analytics Engine
miniTree.how: Scheduled jobs compute aggregates. Moving averages cached in Redis.

miniTree.name: Embeddable Widget
miniTree.how: Lightweight JavaScript bundle loads via CDN.

token-launcher.title: Token Launcher
token-launcher.overview: One-click Solana SPL token deployment platform. Handles metadata creation, automatic liquidity pool setup on Raydium, and initial distribution configuration.

features.name: SPL Token creation wizard
features.what: Step-by-step interface guiding users through token creation.
features.how: React wizard collects parameters. Backend validates and constructs the create mint transaction.

features.name: Metaplex metadata setup
features.how: Metaplex SDK creates the metadata account. Logo uploaded to Arweave.
features.why: Metadata is essential for wallet display.

features.name: Auto Raydium pool creation
features.how: Raydium SDK creates an AMM pool.

features.name: Initial distribution tools
features.how: CSV upload parses recipients. Backend constructs versioned transactions.
features.why: Fair distribution is crucial for credibility.

token-launcher.dependencies: Integrates with Burn Engine for burn-enabled tokens.
token-launcher.architecture: Frontend wizard collects parameters. Backend validates and deploys. Raydium pool creation follows.

miniTree.name: Token Creation
miniTree.what: Core wizard for creating SPL tokens.
miniTree.how: Step-by-step form. Solana Web3.js creates the mint.

miniTree.name: Metaplex Integration
miniTree.how: Metaplex SDK creates on-chain metadata. Images on Arweave.

miniTree.name: Raydium Pools
miniTree.how: Raydium SDK creates concentrated liquidity pool.
miniTree.why: Tokens need liquidity to be tradeable.

miniTree.name: Multi-sig Support
miniTree.why: Single points of failure are risky.

miniTree.name: Token Templates
miniTree.how: Templates define parameters, burn rates, schedules.

oracle.title: ASDF Oracle
oracle.overview: Proprietary oracle calculating the K-Metric, a composite health indicator for the ecosystem. Aggregates data from multiple sources.

features.name: K-Metric calculation algorithm
features.how: Python algorithm assigns weights to normalized metrics.
features.why: Single metrics can be misleading. K-Metric provides holistic view.

features.name: Multi-source data aggregation
features.what: Collects data from Helius, Jupiter, Birdeye, GitHub.
features.how: Scheduled collectors run every 5 minutes.
features.why: No single source tells the whole story.

features.name: Webhook alerts for thresholds
features.what: Automated alerts when metrics cross thresholds.
features.how: Alert rules trigger webhook notifications.

oracle.dependencies: Pulls data from Helius, Jupiter, Birdeye, internal burn metrics.
oracle.architecture: Data collectors fetch from APIs. Python calculates K-Metric. InfluxDB stores time-series. Grafana visualizes.

miniTree.name: K-Metric Algorithm
miniTree.how: Normalizes metrics, applies weights, computes score.

miniTree.name: Alert System
miniTree.how: AlertManager evaluates rules, dispatches to Discord/Telegram.

miniTree.name: ML Predictions
miniTree.how: LSTM networks trained on historical data.

learn-platform.title: Learn Platform
learn-platform.overview: Gamified educational platform with 5 progressive levels. Users earn XP and badges by completing interactive tutorials.

features.name: 5 progressive learning levels
features.what: Structured curriculum from basics to advanced.
features.how: Levels unlock sequentially as users complete requirements.

features.name: XP and badge system
features.how: Actions earn XP. Badges awarded for milestones.

features.name: Interactive quizzes
features.what: Knowledge checks with multiple choice questions.
features.how: Quiz engine validates answers with immediate feedback.

features.name: Progress persistence
features.how: LocalStorage saves completed lessons, XP, badges.

learn-platform.architecture: Single-page application with vanilla JavaScript. LocalStorage persists progress.

miniTree.name: Badge System
miniTree.how: Progress tracking awards badges at milestones.

miniTree.name: Progress Sync
miniTree.how: LocalStorage saves data. Versioned for migrations.

miniTree.name: Multi-language
miniTree.how: i18n framework with JSON translation files.

rpc-monitor.title: RPC Monitor
rpc-monitor.overview: Infrastructure health monitoring for all RPC endpoints. Tracks latency, uptime, and error rates.

features.name: Multi-endpoint health checks
features.what: Continuous monitoring of all RPC endpoints.
features.how: Cron job pings each endpoint every 30 seconds.

features.name: Latency tracking
features.what: Measures response times for each endpoint.
features.how: Each health check records response time. Percentiles calculated.

features.name: Discord/Telegram alerts
features.what: Immediate notifications when endpoints go down.
features.how: AlertManager triggers webhooks.

rpc-monitor.dependencies: Monitors Helius and backup RPC endpoints.
rpc-monitor.architecture: Cron-based health checker. Results stored in Prometheus. Grafana dashboards visualize.

miniTree.name: Health Checker
miniTree.how: Node.js cron sends getHealth requests every 30s.

miniTree.name: Multi-region
miniTree.how: Distributed checkers in NA, EU, Asia.

holdex.title: HolDEX Terminal
holdex.overview: Professional trading interface with TradingView charts, real-time order books, and technical analysis tools.

features.name: TradingView charting
features.how: TradingView widget integration.

features.name: Real-time order books
features.how: WebSocket connections aggregate data.

features.name: Watchlists and alerts
features.what: Custom token watchlists with price alerts.
features.how: User-created lists stored in PostgreSQL.

holdex.dependencies: Uses ASDF Oracle for K-Metric. Jupiter for trade execution.

miniTree.name: Watchlists

miniTree.name: Whale Tracking

features.name: 9 unique mini-games

features.name: Ticket-based rewards
features.how: Score-to-ticket conversion server-side.

miniTree.name: Leaderboards

security-audit.title: Security Audit
security-audit.overview: Security scanning suite for smart contracts and APIs.

features.name: Smart contract scanning
features.how: Slither and custom analyzers.
features.why: Smart contract bugs can be catastrophic.

features.name: API fuzzing
features.how: OWASP ZAP generates test cases.

features.name: Continuous monitoring
features.how: GitHub Actions integration.

security-audit.architecture: Python orchestration. Slither/Mythril for contracts. OWASP ZAP for APIs.

pumparena.title: Pump Arena
pumparena.overview: Competitive trading simulation game where players battle for leaderboard supremacy. Features real-time PvP trading, equipment crafting, and tournament modes with token rewards.

features.name: PvP Trading Battles
features.what: Head-to-head trading simulations where players compete to generate the highest returns.
features.how: Simulated market engine generates price movements. Players execute buy/sell decisions in real-time. Server validates all trades.
features.why: Gamifies trading skills without financial risk. Competitive element drives engagement.

features.name: Equipment & Loadouts
features.what: Collectible equipment that provides trading bonuses and visual customization.
features.how: Equipment stored in player inventory. Stats modify trading performance. Crafting combines items.
features.why: Progression system keeps players invested long-term. Personalization creates attachment.

features.name: Tournament Mode
features.what: Scheduled competitive events with prize pools.
features.how: Bracket-based tournaments with qualification rounds. Finals streamed with spectator mode.
features.why: Creates community events and highlights top players.

features.name: Anti-Cheat System
features.how: All game state computed server-side. Client only renders. Rate limiting and pattern detection.
features.why: Fair competition is essential for competitive integrity.

pumparena.dependencies: Uses ASDF Oracle for prize pool distribution. Leaderboards integrated with Games Platform.
pumparena.architecture: Client-server architecture with authoritative server. WebSocket for real-time updates. Redis for session state and leaderboards.

miniTree.name: Battle Engine
miniTree.how: Server generates market data. Validates player actions. Calculates results.

miniTree.name: Tutorial & Onboarding
miniTree.how: Guided battles with hints. Progressive difficulty.

arcade.title: ASDF Arcade
arcade.overview: Collection of casual browser games with Solana wallet integration. Earn tickets through gameplay, compete on weekly leaderboards, and redeem rewards.

features.name: 9 Unique Mini-Games
features.what: Diverse game collection including Snake, Tetris-style, and original concepts.
features.how: Canvas-based rendering. Modular game engine with shared utilities.
features.why: Variety prevents boredom. Different skill types appeal to different players.

features.name: Ticket Rewards
features.what: Performance-based ticket earnings for leaderboard placement.
features.how: Score-to-ticket conversion with diminishing returns. Weekly distribution.
features.why: Tangible rewards motivate play without unsustainable token inflation.

features.name: Weekly Leaderboards
features.what: Fresh competition every week with seasonal rewards.
features.how: Redis sorted sets. Weekly reset cron job. Historical archives.
features.why: Weekly resets give everyone a chance. Prevents permanent top-heavy boards.

features.name: Wallet Integration
features.what: Connect Solana wallet to track progress and claim rewards.
features.how: Wallet-standard adapters. Signature-based authentication.
features.why: On-chain identity ties progress to player. Enables reward distribution.

arcade.dependencies: Standalone platform with optional wallet connection.
arcade.architecture: Client-side games with server-side score validation. Anti-cheat validates score submissions.

manifesto.title: ASDF Manifesto
manifesto.overview: The philosophical foundation of ASDF. Explains why we burn, what we believe, and the vision for sustainable value creation in crypto.

features.name: Core Philosophy
features.how: Written document explaining principles: burn > extract, builders > traders, long-term > short-term.
features.why: Shared values create strong communities. Philosophy guides decisions.

features.name: Burn Rationale
features.what: Detailed explanation of why burning creates value.
features.how: Economic analysis, historical examples, and comparisons to other deflationary mechanisms.
features.why: Transparency builds trust. Education reduces FUD.

features.name: Builder Culture
features.what: Why ASDF prioritizes builders over speculators.
features.how: Case studies of builder-focused projects. Incentive structure analysis.
features.why: Sustainable growth requires creation, not just trading.

features.name: Interactive Explainers
features.how: Animated diagrams, calculators, and scenario simulations.
features.why: Not everyone learns from text. Multiple formats improve comprehension.

manifesto.dependencies: Standalone content. Links to other ASDF properties.
manifesto.architecture: Static site with progressive enhancement. Works without JavaScript.

factory.title: Builder Factory
factory.overview: Educational content hub powering the Build platform. Interactive courses, skill workshops, and hands-on projects that transform learners into active ASDF builders.

features.name: Three Learning Tracks
features.what: Specialized paths for Dev, Games, and Content builders.
features.how: Track-specific curricula with progressive modules. Each track unlocks relevant skills in Yggdrasil.
features.why: Different builders have different goals. Focused learning accelerates mastery.

features.name: Interactive Workshops
features.what: Hands-on coding sessions with real projects.
features.how: Live code environments. Step-by-step guidance. Instant feedback on exercises.
features.why: Learning by doing beats passive consumption.

features.name: Skill Certification
features.how: Quiz assessments unlock skill badges. Progress stored on-chain via PDA.
features.why: Credentials prove competence to ecosystem projects.

features.name: XP & Progression
features.what: Gamified learning with levels and rewards.
features.how: Actions earn XP. Levels unlock advanced content. Streaks boost earnings.
features.why: Gamification increases completion rates and engagement.

factory.dependencies: Core educational engine for Build platform. Feeds skill data to Yggdrasil visualization.
factory.architecture: Modular course system. LocalStorage for progress. Future: wallet-based cloud sync.

miniTree.name: Dev Track
miniTree.how: 10 modules from basics to advanced. Anchor, PDAs, CPIs.

miniTree.name: Quiz Engine
miniTree.how: Multiple choice with explanations. Adaptive difficulty.

roadmap.text: Complete all track content with quizzes

features.name: Live Burn Feed
features.how: WebSocket connection to Helius webhooks. Push updates on every burn.
features.why: Transparency in action. See burns as they happen.

features.name: Historical Analytics
features.what: Charts showing burn trends over time.
features.how: PostgreSQL stores all burns. Chart.js renders visualizations.
features.why: Historical context reveals patterns and progress.

features.name: Supply Projections
features.how: Takes burn rate, applies assumptions, shows supply curves.

features.name: Burn Notifications
features.how: Threshold triggers. Discord and Telegram integration.

burns.architecture: Backend subscribes to Helius webhooks. PostgreSQL stores historical data. WebSocket server pushes updates.

learn.title: Learn Platform
learn.overview: Gamified educational platform teaching Solana development, game creation, and content production. Earn XP, unlock badges, and track your progress.

features.name: Three Learning Tracks
features.how: Track-specific curricula with shared fundamentals.

features.name: XP & Leveling

features.how: Markdown-based content with embedded code runners.
